title: New Partnerships & A Preview
content:
Greater Albion Typefounders has announced some new reseller partnerships on their [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015023717/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/).

Weve also posted a preview of one of our next new releases "Svengali Roman Incised"-one of several faces to be added to the Svengali Roman 'family'.
author: Rasendyll
